original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: Atha kho māgho māṇavo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha khalu māghaḥ māṇavaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu māghaḥ māṇavaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Ahañhi, bho gotama, dāyako dānapati vadaññū yācayogo;
analyzed: aham hi bho gotama dāyakaḥ dānapati vadaññū yāca yogaḥ

original: dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhammaladdhehi bhogehi dhammādhigatehi ekassapi dadāmi
analyzed: dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhamma laddhehi bhogehi dhamma adhigatehi ekassa api dadāmi

original: dvinnampi tiṇṇampi catunnampi pañcannampi channampi sattannampi aṭṭhannampi navannampi
analyzed: dvinnam pi tiṇṇam pi catunnam pi pañcannam pi channam pi sattannam pi aṭṭhannam pi navannam pi

original: dasannampi dadāmi, vīsāyapi tiṁsāyapi cattālīsāyapi paññāsāyapi dadāmi, satassapi
analyzed: dadāmi tisāya pi cattālīsāya api paññāsāya pi dadāmi satassa pi

original: Kaccāhaṁ, bho gotama, evaṁ dadanto evaṁ yajanto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavāmī”ti?
analyzed: kacca āha bho gotamaḥ evam dadantaḥ evam yajantaḥ bahum puññam pasavāmi iti

original: “Taggha tvaṁ, māṇava, evaṁ dadanto evaṁ yajanto bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavasi.
analyzed: tat ha tva māṇavaḥ evam dadantaḥ evam yajantaḥ bahum puññam pasavasi

original: Yo kho, māṇava, dāyako dānapati vadaññū yācayogo;
analyzed: yaḥ kho māṇava dāyakaḥ dānapati vadaññū yāca yogaḥ

original: dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhammaladdhehi bhogehi dhammādhigatehi ekassapi dadāti …pe… satassapi dadāti, bhiyyopi dadāti, bahuṁ so puññaṁ pasavatī”ti.
analyzed: dhammena bhoge pariyesitvā dhamma laddhehi bhogehi dhamma adhigatehi ekassa api dadāti pe satassa api dadāti bhiyyas api dadāti bahum so puññam pasavati iti

original: Atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
analyzed: atha khalu māghaḥ māṇavaḥ bhagavantam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi
yaḥ yāca yogaḥ dāna pati gahaṭṭhaḥ
yaḥ yāca yogaḥ dāna pati gahaṭṭhaḥ
yaḥ yāca yogaḥ dāna pati gahaṭṭhaḥ

original: Yesu na māyā vasati na māno,
analyzed: yesu na māyā vasati na māno
yesam taṇhā na atthi kuhiñci loke
su sañña tat tā tasaravaḥ ujju
ye vīta rāgā su samāhita indriyā

original: Ye hettha jānanti yathā tathā idaṁ,
analyzed: ye ha itthā jānanti yathā tathā idam
ayam antimā na atthi punabbhavaḥ ti
tvañc ha itthā jānāsi yathā tathā ida

original: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo.
analyzed: tathā hi te viditaḥ esa dhammo
yaḥ yāca yogaḥ dāna pati gahaṭṭhaḥ
a jānataḥ me muni brūhi puṭṭhaḥ
bhagavā hi me sakkhi brahmajja diṭṭhaḥ
tuvan hi naḥ brahma samaḥ asi sat ca
upapajjati brahma lokan ti brūmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte māghaḥ māṇavaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
